extends CordovaActivity

      • refresh

        public void refresh(java.lang.String url)
        If an action causes a redirect to the login page, this method will be called. It causes the session to be refreshed and reloads url through the front door.
        Parameters:
        url - the page to load once the session has been refreshed.

        public java.lang.String getFrontDoorUrl(java.lang.String url,
                                        boolean isAbsUrl)
        Returns the front-doored URL of a URL passed in.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to be front-doored.
        isAbsUrl - True - if the URL should be used as is, False - otherwise.
        Returns:
        Front-doored URL.
